results.abstract: Edwin E Aldrin Sr, father of Apollo 11 astronaut Edwin E Aldrin Jr, dies, Brielle, NJ; was 78 yrs old (S)

headline.main: Edwin E. Aldrin Sr., 78, Is Dead; Aviator Was Astronaut's Father; Managed Newark Airport

results.snippet: BRIELLE, N.J., Jan. 1 (AP)-- Edwin E. Aldrin Sr., a retired Air Force colonel who was a founder of the Aeronautical Engineering School, now the Air Force Institute of Technology, died Saturday while visiting a daughter in San Francisco. He was 78...
results.lead_paragraph: BRIELLE, N.J., Jan. 1 (AP)-- Edwin E. Aldrin Sr., a retired Air Force colonel who was a founder of the Aeronautical Engineering School, now the Air Force Institute of Technology, died Saturday while visiting a daughter in San Francisco. He was 78 years old and lived here.

results.snippet: JACKSON, Mich.--"Why can't the Government take some of that money it's appropriated for jobs and put construction workers back to work on the power plants?" James A. McDivitt, executive vice president for corporate affairs of the Consumers Power...
results.lead_paragraph: JACKSON, Mich.--"Why can't the Government take some of that money it's appropriated for jobs and put construction workers back to work on the power plants?" James A. McDivitt, executive vice president for corporate affairs of the Consumers Power Company, asked in a recent interview here.

results.abstract: New Mexico: James Egan travel article on Taos, NM, ski vacation; illus; map (L)

headline.main: A Dream Of Skiing At Taos; Skiing at Taos

results.snippet: THE other day, I met a New York couple who confessed to having the almost identical recurrent dream. Both husband and wife  dream of endless slopes of dry, dry powder . . . blue skies, brilliant sun. . nary a lift line in sight. But there they...
results.lead_paragraph: THE other day, I met a New York couple who confessed to having the almost identical recurrent dream. Both husband and wife dream of endless slopes of dry, dry powder . . . blue skies, brilliant sun. . nary a lift line in sight. But there they --literally--part company.

headline.main: Soyuz Crew on 'Strenuous' Schedule After Salyut 4 Link-Up

results.snippet: MOSCOW, Jan. 12 The Soyuz 17 astronauts prepared today for what was described as a "strenuous" schedule following their link-up in orbit with the Salyut 4 research station.

results.lead_paragraph: The president of the New Jersey Bar Association, Stanley S. Brotman of Vineland, will be nominated by President Ford to be a United States judge for the district of New Jersey, the White House announced yesterday. He succeeds Mitchell H. results.abstract: Alfalfa Club honors Pres Ford at its 62d annual dinner; Sen H H Humprhey, newly elected club pres, and Frank Borman, outgoing club pres, escort Ford (S)

headline.main: Ford Honored in Capital At Alfalfa Club Dinner

results.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 25 (AP) President Ford was honored tonight at the 62d  annual dinner of the Alfalfa club, an organization of prominent men in government, business and the military.
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 25 (AP) President Ford was honored tonight at the 62d annual dinner of the Alfalfa club, an organization of prominent men in government, business and the military.

results.snippet: The Andy Warhol Factory of International Art Artifacts has at long last turned its atention to the theater. It was a musical, appropriately enough about bombs, called "Man on the Moon." It is the kind of show that can leave a strong man a little numb...
results.lead_paragraph: The Andy Warhol Factory of International Art Artifacts has at long last turned its atention to the theater. It was a musical, appropriately enough about bombs, called "Man on the Moon." It is the kind of show that can leave a strong man a little numb and a litle dumb.
